title: ETF Overlap Analysis
subtitle: Compare multiple ETFs to visualize their weighted overlap
searchPlaceholder: Type ETF ticker or name (e.g., SPY, QQQ)...
searchHint: üí° Type to search, press Space or Enter to add, Backspace to remove
addAtLeastTwo: Add at least 2 ETFs to compare
coreOverlapTitle: Core Overlap - Holdings in ALL {{count}} ETFs
coreOverlapDesc: of portfolio weight is shared across all ETFs
noSharedHoldings: ‚ö†Ô∏è No holdings are shared across all {{count}} ETFs. They have completely different portfolios.
pairwiseDesc: Values show weighted overlap percentage (0-100%). Darker colors indicate higher overlap. Click any cell for details.
highOverlap: High overlap (60-100%): Very similar holdings - minimal diversification benefit
mediumOverlap: Medium overlap (30-60%): Some shared exposure with room for diversification
lowOverlap: Low overlap (0-30%): Different holdings - good diversification potential
diagonal: Diagonal (100%): Each ETF compared to itself
clickCell: üí° Click any cell to see detailed overlapping holdings
name: Name
